---
title: "Introduction"
description: "Easily embed crypto trading in your app with Swap API"
---

<Tip>
**TIP**

Prefer to watch a video or see a code demo instead? Jump to [0x Videos](https://0x.org/docs/introduction/guides#videos) or [0x Code Examples](https://0x.org/docs/introduction/guides#code-examples).
</Tip>

## What is Swap API?

Swap API is a professional-grade DEX aggregation and smart order routing REST API that allows you to find the best price and easily submit the trade with just a few lines of code.

Swap API allows you to add crypto trading in your application with just a single API integration. It finds the best real-time price across 100+ liquidity sources, both public (AMMs) and private (professional market makers), across [the supported chains](https://0x.org/docs/0x-swap-api/introduction#supported-networks).

<Frame>
![Swap API UI](https://0x.org/docs/assets/images/swap-api-ui-d28611dd5b85f518a34f7c0326f80034.png)
</Frame>

<Tip>
**TIP**

Want to build a gasless trading app? Check out [Gasless API](https://0x.org/docs/gasless-api/introduction) instead.
</Tip>

## Why use Swap API?

Swap API is designed to protect your users, streamline integration for developers, and unlock new revenue opportunities for your team.

- ‚õìÔ∏è **Multi-chain liquidity**: Access deep liquidity across major networks. [See supported networks](https://0x.org/docs/0x-swap-api/introduction#supported-networks).
- ü§ë **Monetize your app**: [Earn revenue](https://0x.org/docs/developer-resources/faqs-and-troubleshooting#monetizing-your-swap-integration) through every swap with built-in fee support.
- üõ°Ô∏è **User protection**: Our smart contracts reduce allowance risk by supporting modern standards like AllowanceHolder and Permit2 for safer token approvals.
- ‚Ü©Ô∏è **Reliable execution**: We offer some of the [lowest revert rates](https://twitter.com/0xProject/status/1750927465483289000) in the industry.
- üí∞ **Exclusive RFQ liquidity**: Access off-chain liquidity with 0 slippage for **RFQ orders**. [Learn how RFQ works](https://0x.org/docs/0x-swap-api/advanced-topics/about-the-rfq-system).
- üöÄ **Developer-friendly**: Easy to integrate and customizable to your use case. Find the best price to buy DAI with WETH with the following request:

## Try it out

Run this curl request to see a live quote response for selling 100,000 WETH to buy DAI:

```bash
// Sell 100,000 WETH for DAI
// Taker address is vitalik.eth
// Replace "YOUR_API_KEY" with your actual API key from https://dashboard.0x.org/create-account
curl --request GET \
  --url "https://api.0x.org/swap/allowance-holder/quote?sellAmount=100000000000000000000000&taker=0xd8dA6BF26964aF9D7eEd9e03E53415D37aA96045&chainId=1&sellToken=0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2&buyToken=0x6b175474e89094c44da98b954eedeac495271d0f" \
  --header "0x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  --header "0x-version: v2"
```

  
You will receive a response that looks like this:
<Accordion title="Expand to see response">
```bash

```
</Accordion>
This is a valid unsigned Ethereum transaction that can be [signed and submitted directly to a node](https://0x.org/docs/0x-swap-api/guides/swap-tokens-with-0x-swap-api#4-send-the-transaction-to-the-network) to complete the swap. Read more about the parameters [here](https://0x.org/docs/api#tag/Swap).

## How does it work?

Swap API is a professional-grade DEX aggregation and smart order routing API. Using the API, developers can easily and reliably tap into aggregated multi-chain DEX liquidity. Swap API finds the best executed price across 150+ liquidity sources, both public (AMMs) and private (professional market makers), across a growing number of blockchains

Below is a high-level diagram showing how Swap API works under the hood:

<Frame>
![Swap API Diagram](https://0x.org/docs/assets/images/swap-api-diagram-b557e01e96f8612c8da768aab6a0e1b6.png)
</Frame>
<Steps>
<Step title="Retail Trader Requests a quote">
</Step>
<Step title="Swap API simultaneously (a) retrieves quote from AMM and (b) requests quotes from Market Makers">
</Step>
<Step title="Market Makers responds with signed quote at their discretion">
</Step>
<Step title="Swap API aggregates the quotes it has received and compares the prices. It returns the best price to the Retail Trader.">
</Step>
<Step title="If the Retail Trader likes the quote, the Retail Trader signs the order. Swap API sends the signed order to the blockchain to be settled by the 0x Protocol.">
</Step>
</Steps>
For more details about how 0x orders are executed, check out [How does 0x work?](https://0x.org/docs/introduction/introduction-to-0x#how-does-0x-work)

Under the hood, Swap API performs a series of tasks:

- **Queries prices** from multiple DEXs and market makers and **aggregates the liquidity** from the queried sources to provide the best price possible. Think of how Google flights aggregates flight prices for a certain time and date to help you find the best price, `/swap` similarly helps you find the best price across DeFi liquidity sources.
- Swap API‚Äôs **smart order routing** algorithm splits up your transaction across different sources to maximize the overall return on your swap. Read more about smart order routing [here](https://medium.com/@merklejerk/0x-apis-smart-order-routing-7af0195515e5).
- The response returned by Swap API is a valid unsigned Ethereum transaction that can be signed and submitted directly to an Ethereum node. **[Easily execute using the transaction using the web3 library of your choice](https://0x.org/docs/0x-swap-api/guides/swap-tokens-with-0x-swap-api#3-send-the-transaction-to-the-network)**.

## Supported Chains

Swap and Gasless v2 APIs are currently supported on the following chains. Select the chain in your request by providing the corresponding `chainId` request parameter. To request support for a new chain, please submit a request [here](https://0x.canny.io/request-features).

| Chain | Chain ID | Swap API | Gasless API |
|:------|:---------|:---------|:------------|
| Ethereum (Mainnet) | 1 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Arbitrum | 42161 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Avalanche | 43114 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Base | 8453 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Berachain | 80094 | ‚úÖ |  |
| Blast | 81457 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| BSC | 56 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Ink | 57073 | ‚úÖ |  |
| Linea | 59144 | ‚úÖ |  |
| Mantle | 5000 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Mode | 34443 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Monad | 10143 | ‚úÖ |  |
| Optimism | 10 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Polygon | 137 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Scroll | 534352 | ‚úÖ | ‚úÖ |
| Unichain | 130 | ‚úÖ |  |
| World Chain | 480 | ‚úÖ |  |

To create an account, and get your live API keys to access 0x APIs, visit the **[0x Dashboard](https://go.0x.org/create-account-txrelay-z)**.
</Note>

Now that you're familiar with what Swap API offers, read [Get started with Swap API](https://0x.org/docs/0x-swap-api/guides/swap-tokens-with-0x-swap-api) to get started or choose one of the resources below.
